A

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class elevator.ElevatorGUI
Invoked from the Timer object (that services as a clock) with a predefined rate controlled with a JSlider guage
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class elevator.ElevatorEvents
Invoked when a button is pressed on a floor or on an inside button panel.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in interface elevator.rmi.RemoteActionListener
Remotely invoked when an action event is fired by a source (button or timer).
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class elevator.rmi.LinkButton
Receives an ActionEvent from an elevator button via Java RMI and passes the event to all subscribed listeners.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class elevator.rmi.impl.PositionListener
Invoked when an inside button of the evelator is pressed.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class elevator.rmi.impl.FloorListener
Invoked when an floor button is pressed.

Invoked when an inside button of the evelator is pressed.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class elevator.demo.AnimationDemo
Invoked when any button on the Elevators is pressed.
addActionListener(ActionListener) - Method in class elevator.rmi.LinkButton
Adds an ActionListener to this button.
addFloorListener(ActionListener) - Static method in class elevator.rmi.MakeAll
Adds an ActionListener to receive events from all floor buttons.

Adds an array of ActionListener to receive events from all floor buttons.
addFloorListener(int[], ActionListener) - Static method in class elevator.rmi.MakeAll
Adds one ActionListener to receive events from a group of floor buttons.

Adds ActionListener to receive events from floor buttons located on a given floor.
addFloorListener(int, ActionListener[]) - Static method in class elevator.rmi.MakeAll

Adds one ActionListener to receive events from inside panel buttons located in a given elevator.

Adds a group of ActionListener to receive events from inside panel buttons located in a given elevator.
addPositionListener(ActionListener) - Static method in class elevator.rmi.MakeAll
Adds one ActionListener for monitoring postions of all elevators.

Adds a group of ActionListener for monitoring postions of one elevator.
addVelocityListener(ActionListener) - Static method in class elevator.rmi.MakeAll
Adds one ActionListener for monitoring chnages in elevator velocity.
animate(int) - Method in class elevator.ElevatorGraphics
Gets a current state of one elevator and compares with the old (previous) state, requests to repaint the elevator if the old state has changed, stores the new state as the old state.
animateAll() - Method in class elevator.ElevatorGraphics
Gets a current state of all elevator (one by one) and compare with the old (previous) state, requests to repaint the elevator if the old state has changed, stores the new state as the old state.
AnimationDemo - class elevator.demo.AnimationDemo.
The class is a primary class of the AnimationDemo Java application which illustrates a way of controling the Elevators application via Java RMI.
AnimationDemo() - Constructor for class elevator.demo.AnimationDemo
Creates an instace of AnimationDemo to run in a separate thread
arrowDownButton - Static variable in class elevator.ElevatorGUI
An array of "arrow down" floor buttons
arrowUpButton - Static variable in class elevator.ElevatorGUI
An array of "arrow up" floor buttons

C

CLOSE - Static variable in class elevator.Elevators
The opcode of the "close door" command sent to a door, for example, "d 1 -1" (close the door of the 1st elevator)
CLOSE - Static variable in interface elevator.rmi.Doors
The command to close a door(s).

Close all doors.

connectToClient(int, int) - Method in class elevator.ElevatorIO
Opens a TCP socket or a couple of sockets (if different ports are specified for input and output) and waits until a client(s) connects.

D

DefaultNumberOfElevators - Static variable in class elevator.Elevators
Default number of elevators = 1
defaultPort - Static variable in class elevator.Elevators
Default port for input/output via a TCP socket = 4711
DefaultTopFloor - Static variable in class elevator.Elevators
Default top floor number = 2
delayStep - Static variable in class elevator.ElevatorGUI
Timer delay step
Door - interface elevator.rmi.Door.
The remote interface for controlling a door of an elevator via RMI stub.
door(int, int) - Method in class elevator.ElevatorIO
Executes a "d" ("door") control command read from standard or socket input stream: starts/stops openning/closing the door.
DoorImpl - class elevator.rmi.impl.DoorImpl.
The class DoorImpl implements the elevator.rmi.Door remote interface.
DoorImpl(int) - Constructor for class elevator.rmi.impl.DoorImpl
Allocates a new DoorImpl object that represents a door of an elevator with the given elevator number.
doorRMI(int, int) - Method in class elevator.ElevatorIO
Executes a "d" ("door") control command accepted on an remote interface used to control door(s) such as Door, Doors, Elevator and Elevators.
Doors - interface elevator.rmi.Doors.
The remote interface for controlling doors of elevators via RMI stub.
DoorsImpl - class elevator.rmi.impl.DoorsImpl.
The class DoorsImpl implements the remote interface elevator.rmi.Doors used for controlling doors of elevators via RMI.
DoorsImpl() - Constructor for class elevator.rmi.impl.DoorsImpl
Allocates a new DoorsImpl object that represents doors of all elevators.
DoorStatus - class elevator.DoorStatus.
Enumeration that generates six status of an elevator door: CLOSED, OPEN1, OPEN2, OPEN3, OPEN4, which correspond to diferrent "degree of openness" of the door used in elevator animation.
DoorStatus() - Constructor for class elevator.DoorStatus
Creates an instance of DoorStatus
DOWN - Static variable in class elevator.Elevators
The code of the "move downwards" command sent to a motor, for example "m 1 -1" (start moving the 1st elevator downwards)
DOWN - Static variable in interface elevator.rmi.Motors
The down command.

E

elevator - package elevator
Provides classes and interfaces for the Elevators application which models the hardware of elevators (motors, cabins, doors, scale, inside and floor buttons).
Elevator - class elevator.Elevator.
Represents a state of components of one elevator, i.e. the motor, the elevator cabin, the door and the scale, and provides methods for inspecting and altering the state.
Elevator - interface elevator.rmi.Elevator.
The remote interface for controlling all components of one elevator, i.e. a motor, a scale (level indicator) and a door, via RMI.
elevator.demo - package elevator.demo
Contains the primary class of the AminationDemo application which illustrates a way of controlling the elevator.Elevators application via Java RMI.
elevator.rmi - package elevator.rmi
Provides remote interfaces for controlling and monitoring the elevator.Elevators application via Java RMI and a class (MakeAll) which is used to obtain remote references (stubs) with these interfaces.
elevator.rmi.impl - package elevator.rmi.impl
Provides classes implementing remote interfaces defined in the elevator.rmi package for controlling components of elevators (motors, doors and scales) and for monitoring elevator and floor buttons as well as positions of moving elevators via Java RMI.
Elevator(int) - Constructor for class elevator.Elevator
Constructs an instance of Elevator that represents the elevator with the given number.
ElevatorCanvas - class elevator.ElevatorCanvas.
ElevatorCanvas is a panel used to display a current state of one elevator.
ElevatorCanvas() - Constructor for class elevator.ElevatorCanvas
Creates an instance of ElevatorCanvas that is used to display one elevator.
ElevatorEvents - class elevator.ElevatorEvents.
Provides an action listener for all buttons and a window listener for the elevator main frame.
ElevatorEvents(PrintStream) - Constructor for class elevator.ElevatorEvents
Creates an instance ElevatorEvents listener
ElevatorGraphics - class elevator.ElevatorGraphics.
Provides animation of elevators at a rate of the amination Timer.
ElevatorGraphics(Elevators) - Constructor for class elevator.ElevatorGraphics
Creates an object with the ElevatorGraphics class, gets a reference to array of Elevator objects (the model of elevators) and the ElevatorIO object.
ElevatorGUI - class elevator.ElevatorGUI.
Provides GUI for the Elevators application.
ElevatorGUI(String, Elevators) - Constructor for class elevator.ElevatorGUI
Creates a graphical user interface of the Elevator Application, creates an object with the ElevatorEvents class to listen for action events from buttons and to print action commands carried in the events, creates an object with the ElevatorGraphics used to animate elevators, creates an array of objects with the ElevatorCanvas class used to display elevators, creates and starts the Timer object that clocks animation in the ElevatorGraphics object, creates a object with the ElevatorIO class to handle application input/output via standard input/output or TCP sockets or/and Java RMI in separate threads.
ElevatorImpl - class elevator.rmi.impl.ElevatorImpl.
The class ElevatorImpl implements the remote interface elevator.rmi.Elevator that is used for controlling a motor, a scale (level indicator) and a door of an elevator via RMI.
ElevatorImpl(int) - Constructor for class elevator.rmi.impl.ElevatorImpl
Allocates a new ElevatorImpl object that represents all components (motor, scale, door) of an elevator with the given number.
ElevatorIO - class elevator.ElevatorIO.
Provides input and execution of control commands (open/close doors, star/stop moving elevators, set/get values of scales) from standard input, TCP socket connections or/and via Java RMI (from servants), and output of action commands from the floor and inside buttons and current position of elevators to standard output, TCP socket or/and via Java RMI (to listening servants).
ElevatorIO(Elevators) - Constructor for class elevator.ElevatorIO
Creates an instance of ElevatorIO that opens a TCP socket and waits until a client (a controller) connects if Elevators has started with the "-tcp" option, it creates a GetAllImpl object for controlling Elevators via Java RMI and binds its reference (stub) to the "GetAll" name at the rmiregistry if Elevators has started with the "-rmi" option.
Elevators - class elevator.Elevators.
The primary class of the Elevators application written in Java that simulates elevators (motors, doors, scales, inside button panels and floor buttons).
Elevators - interface elevator.rmi.Elevators.
The remote interface is used for controlling all components of all elevators, i.e. motors, scales (level indicators) and doors of all elevator, a group of elevators or one elevator.
Elevators(String[]) - Constructor for class elevator.Elevators
Creates an instance of Elevators, parses the input parameters, creates the "Model" of the application (array of objects with the Elevator class) and the "View" of the application (an object of the ElevatorGUI class).
ElevatorsImpl - class elevator.rmi.impl.ElevatorsImpl.
The class ElevatorsImpl implements the remote interface elevator.rmi.Elevators that is used for controlling motors, scales (level indicators) and doors of all elevator via RMI.
ElevatorsImpl() - Constructor for class elevator.rmi.impl.ElevatorsImpl
Allocates a new ElevatorsImpl object that represents all components (motors, scales, doors and inside buttons) of all elevators.
EOL - Static variable in class elevator.Elevators
System "end-of-line" character.

F

FloorListener - class elevator.rmi.impl.FloorListener.
The helper class FloorListener that implements the java.awt.event.ActionListener interface for receiving action events from floor buttons.
FloorListener(int, RemoteActionListener) - Constructor for class elevator.rmi.impl.FloorListener
Allocates a new FloorButtonListener used to receive events from floor buttons and to forward the events to a remote listener.

G

GetAll - interface elevator.rmi.GetAll.
The remote interface for obtaining references to remote objects of the Elevators application used for controlling elevator components: motors, doors, scales, and for making button listeners which forward action events from the buttons to remote listeners via the RemoteActionListener interface.
GetAllImpl - class elevator.rmi.impl.GetAllImpl.
The class implements the GetAll remote interface that provides references to components of elevators to be controlled via RMI.
GetAllImpl() - Constructor for class elevator.rmi.impl.GetAllImpl
 
Getdir() - Method in class elevator.Elevator
Returns the current direction of movement of the elevator cabin (motor), e.g. 1 (upwards), -1 (downwards), 0(stopped).
Getdoor() - Method in class elevator.Elevator
Returns the current direction of movement of the door, e.g. 1 (opening), -1 (closing), 0 (still).

hasMoreElements() - Method in class elevator.DoorStatus
 

I

IllegalParamException - exception elevator.rmi.IllegalParamException.
THe IllegalParamException class represents exceptions that may occur during the execution (or the attempt to execute) of a method call of remote interfaces used to control components of the Elevators application.
IllegalParamException() - Constructor for class elevator.rmi.IllegalParamException
Constructs a IllegalParamException with no specified detail message.
init() - Static method in class elevator.rmi.MakeAll
Initializes the MakeAll class that provide RMI access to the Elevators application.
init(int) - Static method in class elevator.rmi.MakeAll
Initializes the MakeAll class that provide RMI access to the Elevators application.
init(String) - Static method in class elevator.rmi.MakeAll
Initializes the MakeAll class that provide RMI access to the Elevators application.
init(String, int) - Static method in class elevator.rmi.MakeAll
Initializes the MakeAll class that provide RMI access to the Elevators application.
insideButton - Static variable in class elevator.ElevatorGUI
An array of inside panel buttons
InsideListener - class elevator.rmi.impl.InsideListener.
The helper class InsideListener that implements the java.awt.event.ActionListener interface for receiving action events from an inside button panel of one elevator with a given number or from inside panels of all elevators.
io - Static variable in class elevator.ElevatorGUI
A reference to the i/o object of the application that provides input and output and an interface to the elevators model (motors, doors and scales)

main(String[]) - Static method in class elevator.Elevators
The main entry to the application.

The entry point of the AnimationDemo application.
MakeAll - class elevator.rmi.MakeAll.
The MakeAll class provides class's methods for obtaining remote references (stubs) to the objects of the Elevators application, for adding event listeners interesting in receiving action events (action commands) from elevator's and floor buttons, for adding position listeners for monitoring positions of moving elevators and velocity listeners for monitoring changes of elevators' velocity.
makeFloorListener(int, RemoteActionListener) - Method in interface elevator.rmi.GetAll
Creates FloorListener that receives action events from floor buttons located at a given floor and forwards the events to the specified action listener via the listener's RemoteActionListener remote interface.
makeFloorListener(int, RemoteActionListener) - Method in class elevator.rmi.impl.GetAllImpl
 
makeInsideListener(int, RemoteActionListener) - Method in interface elevator.rmi.GetAll
Creates InsideListener that receives action events from inside panel buttons of a given elevator and forwards the events to the specified action listener via the listener's RemoteActionListener remote interface.
makeInsideListener(int, RemoteActionListener) - Method in class elevator.rmi.impl.GetAllImpl
 
makePositionListener(int, RemoteActionListener) - Method in interface elevator.rmi.GetAll
Creates PositionListener that receives action events from the elevator timer and forwards the events with a current position of an elevator with the given number to the specified action listener via the listener's RemoteActionListener remote interface.
makePositionListener(int, RemoteActionListener) - Method in class elevator.rmi.impl.GetAllImpl
 
makeVelocityListener(RemoteActionListener) - Method in interface elevator.rmi.GetAll
Creates VelocityListener that receives an action event when the velocity of elevators has changed by the velocity slider.
makeVelocityListener(RemoteActionListener) - Method in class elevator.rmi.impl.GetAllImpl
 
MaxNumberOfElevators - Static variable in class elevator.Elevators
Maximum possible number of elevators = 5
MaxTopFloor - Static variable in class elevator.Elevators
Maximum possible number of the top floor = 6
Motor - interface elevator.rmi.Motor.
The remote interface for controlling a motor of an elevator via RMI stub.
motor(int, int) - Method in class elevator.ElevatorIO
Executes a "m" ("motor") control command read from standard or socket input stream: starts the elevator moving upwards or downwards, or stops the motor.
MotorImpl - class elevator.rmi.impl.MotorImpl.
The class MotorImpl implements the elevator.rmi.Motor remote interface.
MotorImpl(int) - Constructor for class elevator.rmi.impl.MotorImpl
Allocates a new MotorImpl object that represents a motor of an elevator with the given elevator number.
motorRMI(int, int) - Method in class elevator.ElevatorIO
Executes a "m" ("motor") control command accepted on an remote interface used to control motor(s) such as Motor, Motors, Elevator and Elevators.
Motors - interface elevator.rmi.Motors.
The remote interface for controlling all motors of elevators via RMI stub.
MotorsImpl - class elevator.rmi.impl.MotorsImpl.
The MotorsImpl class implements the remote interface elevator.rmi.Motors used for controlling all motors of elevators via RMI.
MotorsImpl() - Constructor for class elevator.rmi.impl.MotorsImpl
Allocates a new MotorsImpl object that represents motors of all elevators.
move(int[]) - Method in interface elevator.rmi.Motors
Start moving or stop all elevators.
move(int[]) - Method in class elevator.rmi.impl.MotorsImpl
Start moving or stop all elevators.
move(int[]) - Method in class elevator.rmi.impl.ElevatorsImpl
